doc.after: Miami has a tropical monsoon climate (KÃ¶ppen climate classification Am)[36][37] with hot and humid summers and short, warm winters, with a marked drier season in the winter. Its sea-level elevation, coastal location, position just above the Tropic of Cancer, and proximity to the Gulf Stream shapes its climate.
